resources.string:
v1.3.1
- Bug fix: short logs remain open after scanning stops.

v1.3.0
- NEW: change your scan interval to collect more data!
- NEW: information about prizes!
- Added warning when WiFi/location are disabled.
- Added data withdrawal option.
- Updated project information.
- Updated scan status information.
- Bug fix: background scanning stops on some devices.

v1.2.1
- Updated fonts.

v1.2.0
- Added artwork for icons.
- Switched to release API.
- Enabled debug report option.

v1.0.0
- Pre-release.
